what: Custom color palettes for ggplot2 — custom_palette
title: Custom color palettes for ggplot2 — custom_palette
text: Custom color palettes ggplot2 scales. inspiration, see https://github.com/Yu-Group/vthemes/blob/main/R/ggplot-scale-themes.R

title: Custom color palettes for ggplot2 — custom_palette
Custom color palettes for ggplot2 — custom_palette
text: palette Character. color palette use. Options : "high_contrast" high-contrast color palette, "redblue" red-blue color palette, "viridis" viridis color palette. viridis_option Character. viridis color palette use. See viridis available options.

title: Custom color palettes for ggplot2 — custom_palette
code: library(scales) show_col(custom_palette()(8))  show_col(custom_palette(palette = "redblue")(5))  show_col(custom_palette(palette = "viridis")(8)) #> Warning: Number of levels > number of colors in requested palette. Using viridis color palette instead.

title: Custom color scales — scale_color_vmodern
text: Custom scale functions (fill colour/color) ggplot2. discrete == FALSE, vmodern scale uses viridis color palette. discrete == TRUE, custom color palettes used.

title: Custom color scales — scale_color_vmodern
code: scale_colour_vmodern(   discrete = FALSE,   palette = "high_contrast",   viridis_option = "plasma",   ... )  scale_color_vmodern(   discrete = FALSE,   palette = "high_contrast",   viridis_option = "plasma",   ... )  scale_fill_vmodern(   discrete = FALSE,   palette = "high_contrast",   viridis_option = "plasma",   ... )

title: Custom color scales — scale_color_vmodern
text: discrete Logical. TRUE, use discrete color scale. FALSE, use continuous color scale. palette Character. color palette use. Options : "high_contrast" high-contrast color palette, "redblue" red-blue color palette, "viridis" viridis color palette. viridis_option Character. viridis color palette use. See viridis available options. ... Additional arguments pass ggplot2::discrete_scale() discrete == TRUE viridis::scale_color_viridis() viridis::scale_fill_viridis() discrete == FALSE.

title: Custom color scales — scale_color_vmodern
code: library(ggplot2) ggplot(iris) +   aes(x = Sepal.Length, y = Sepal.Width, color = Petal.Length) +   geom_point() +   scale_color_vmodern(discrete = FALSE)  ggplot(iris) +   aes(x = Sepal.Length, fill = Species) +   geom_density() +   scale_fill_vmodern(discrete = TRUE)

title: Custom ggplot2 theme — theme_custom
code: library(ggplot2) ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) +  geom_point() +  theme_custom() #> Warning: font family 'Arial' not found in PostScript font database #> Warning: font family 'Arial' not
